column5: As a new boat owner I was wondering if there is such a map?  I have a beautiful laminated map of the area but one with boat launches marked would be really handy.

Backroads Mapbooks  puts out books that have maps of most of the lakes in different areas.  I have the one for zone 15, and have found it very helpful.  I think you would want zone 18.  They are on sale in many of the stores around here, but you could google them.
I don't know of any maps, but if you go to http://www.kawarthaanglers.com each lake sub forum has google maps links to boat launches.  Hope this helps!
If you have a smartphone, the navionics app is pretty good for locating launches and fishing structures near them. Best $10 ever spent IMO.
try this site and do a refined search hope it helps http://www.web2.mnr.gov.on.ca/fish_online/fishing/fishingExplorer_en.html
This site is pretty decent.  Haven't verified any of it, someone sent me the link.
